description:
To try to chase Kuune away, Mahiro and Kuuko keep acting like a couple, but Kuune still isn`t convinced after seeing their awkward date, adding that she can`t see the subtle lust for each other in each other`s eyes. After having to see Mahiro and Kuuko act like their are engaged to each other, Nyarko finally...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ll Try to Act It Out
